Name: DNS lookups for commonly abused TLDs
Description: Some top level domains (TLDs) are more commonly associated with malware for a range of reasons - including how easy domains on these TLDs are to obtain. Many of these may be undesirable from an enterprise policy perspective. You can update and extend the list of TLD's you wish to search for. The Name Count column provides an initial insight into how widespread the domain usage is across the environment.
